name: The Island (CAGGames)
description:
This is an exploration/walking simulator that is set on a deserted island. Explore the world and find all it's secrets while enjoying breathtaking scenery. This is more so an experiment, but I have put a lot of work into it. There is still a lot left that I have to do, so take that in mind when playing. Otherwise, have fun playing and feel free to send me feedback.

Note - The web build will most likely be very laggy, so I have included downloadable versions as well.
